author: Michael
content:
With 21 layers over a 1/2 second exposure, you'd expect a photo to look over-processed to make up for the low light and long exposure. This photo, however, looks seamless. As always, Andreas, very nice photoshop wizardry.

Oh, and what a great story about Clarence. Its so wonderful how the great internets can connect a musician from NY with a photographer from Austria on a personal level.
